vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in TokenBank.WithdrawToHolder (0x627fa62ccbb1c1b04ffaecd72a53e37fc0e17839.sol#64-73):
	External calls:
	- _addr.call.value(_wei)() (0x627fa62ccbb1c1b04ffaecd72a53e37fc0e17839.sol#69-71)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Holders (0x627fa62ccbb1c1b04ffaecd72a53e37fc0e17839.sol#70)
